main event: Four unidentified flying objects were observed in Erie, Pennsylvania for a duration of 3 seconds on 26 August 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 3 seconds., The objects were reported to be moving Northwest., No photographs or physical evidence were captured during the sighting., The observer described the objects as emitting a glow and changing directions abruptly., The objects were described as circular or oval shaped and metallic in appearance.
witness description: Sam Audisi, 32 years old, from Warren, Pennsylvania.
